title: Meet the Ugandan who's fighting disability prejudice
text:
Meet the Ugandan who's fighting disability prejudice 6:27am EST - 02:00 
Simon Peter Lutaaya from Uganda has fought polio his entire life. He's been left with limited mobility in his limbs - but that hasn't stopped him creating art - and fighting the stigma against disabilities in the country.   
Simon Peter Lutaaya from Uganda has fought polio his entire life. He's been left with limited mobility in his limbs - but that hasn't stopped him creating art - and fighting the stigma against disabilities in the country.  //reut.rs/2oL3Nng
